Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2007 05:34PM emmakeating55 wrote: Loriann, I had my lumpectomy last Halloween.  The frozen peas is a great suggestion after surgery!  I had 15 lymph nodes removed so I had to get a port for the chemo.  That was put in 11/14, (it was a breeze) and I started chemo on Nov. 20.  I had TAC every 21 days for 6 cycles.  I started losing my hair on the 14th day after chemo.  It was annoying, but if you get it cut into a really short style first it's not too bad.  On day 19 I got it shaved. You'll find a ton of support here!  Best of luck!
Posts.Title: Starting chemo after lumpectomy..how long? loriann Keenie
